fields.name: Usage: /settings show
fields.value: This command displays this server's settings.

fields.name: Usage: /settings inactive <days>
fields.value: This command sets how many **days** a user must remain inactive before inactive roles are given to them. Set this to 0 to disable inactive roles.

fields.name: Usage: /settings userlog
fields.value: This command opens a menu to select which channels are notified when a user joins or leaves the server.

fields.name: Usage: /settings msglog
fields.value: This command opens a menu to select which channels are notified when messages (except for those in chosen channels) are deleted.
